title: Insect Life Cycle
description: Insect Life Cycle introduces readers to different types of insects. It then gives the details of two different types of life cycles and describes the separate stages: egg, larva, pupa, nymph, and adult. Photographs with captions support the text.
highFrequencyWords: adult, cocoons, egg, larva, life cycle, metamorphosis, nymph, pupa
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Commas                : Recognize and use commas in a series
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
